name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of chemistry, including atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the properties of matter.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: This course covers the basics of organic chemistry, including the structure, nomenclature, and reactions of organic compounds.

name: Instrumental Analysis
description: This course covers the use of instruments in chemical analysis, including spectroscopy, chromatography, and mass spectrometry.

name: Physical Chemistry I
description: This course covers the mathematical foundations of chemistry, such as thermodynamics, kinetics, and quantum mechanics.

name: Nuclear Chemistry
description: This course covers the basics of nuclear chemistry, including the structure of the atom, radioactive decay, and nuclear reactions.
